Class PlayersGameplay

Tools.PlayersGameplay
public class PlayersGameplay extends Object
The class PlayerGameplay manages the player perspective.

    • assigncountries

      public static void assigncountries(ArrayList<Player> p_playersArray, ArrayList<Country> p_countryList, ArrayList<Continent> p_continentList)
      This method is used to randomly assign the countries to the user once the game begins.
      Parameters:
      p_playersArray - refers to the number of players playing the game.
      p_countryList - refers to the list of countries in the Map.
      p_continentList - refers to all the continents present in the Map.
